idea: Customer to Business Model of online interaction
name: Arindam Chakraborty

idea:
VOLOQ was founded in 2016 in Mumbai, where everyone is constantly on the move and everything needs to serve a purpose (or even better multiple purposes). What we wear and carry has to hold upto the rigors of the city’s fast paced life.
Our mark was to provide an impeccable quality alternative to the typical full leather briefcases and synthetic backpacks. Drawing inspiration from Indian Culture and Western Traditions, we take great pride in crafting timeless designs that not only protect your gear but also complement your style. Targeting men & women with contemporary urban lifestyle each Voloq product is handcrafted using premium quality eco-friendly and vegan materials.
name: FAT GENIE GLOBAL RETAIL PVT LTD

idea: Harabaag is a (Software as a Service) product targeted towards the participants in the post-harvest agriculture supply chain.  These would include farmers, graders/processor, middlemen, logistics suppliers, warehouses/cold-storages, buyers and exporters.
name: Harabaag

idea:
AutoBox App is the New & Effortless way to Buy New Vehicles.
All you do is shortlist and submit your vehicle of choice and let the official dealers compete for your business by offering you their Best Quotes.
All this without having to leave the comfort of your home and without even stepping foot into the vehicle showroom.
Best of all it’s completely FREE whether you buy a vehicle or not!
name: DANOX APPS LLP

idea:

idea:
UnFound is an online news aggregator standing at the intersection of Artificial Intelligence and News!    

UnFound is designed to cut through the media clutter- by providing context and perspectives to the news topics, from authentic sources in one place - with minimal human involvement.
name: HUMANITY PLUS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
